meanings.sent1: The particles moved antiferromagnetically, repelling each other.
meanings.sent2: The magnets aligned antiferromagnetically, canceling out their magnetic fields.

meanings.sent4: The dancers moved antiferromagnetically, creating a mesmerizing pattern on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew antiferromagnetically, swirling the leaves in a unique dance.

meanings.sent1: The antiferromagnetic material displayed unique properties under certain conditions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the antiferromagnetic behavior of the new compound.
